bwwExcerpt: For me, the big surprise of this “Sunset Blvd.” is Scherzinger’s outrageously campy over-the-top performance. Like so much of this revival, it is both minimal and excessive. Her look is minimal while her acting goes way beyond anything delivered by either Swanson or Close, neither of whom offered particularly subtle studies in mature womanhood.
wrongShowReason: Cross-show URL collision (revival, no signal): defaulting to most recent production sunset-boulevard-2024
